lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Government bonds (gilts) soared as investors continued to flee from plummetting equities into the relative security of government securities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Noting that such a huge rise in credit extended by banks would under other circumstances have prompted market fears of a rise in clearing bank base rates from the current 10 pct, "With the financial markets doing what they're doing, that's the last thing the Bank of England would want to do," Spencer said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.K. Money market rates, in a similarly calm response, resumed the slightly easier trend of earlier in the morning after little more than a token blip as the figures came out.
